Select the humorous reinterpretation that alters the title of the movie or music artist.
Identify the whimsical modification that 'ruins' the title of the movie or the name of the music artist.
Select the humorous twist that distorts the title of the movie or music artist.
Select the humorous alteration that distorts the title of the movie or music artist.
Locate the unconventional modification that 'spoils' the title of the film or musical artist.
